text: Ivan Pentz (born 18 January 1957) is a South African rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:South African male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of South Africa Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ivan Pentz
